subject: Automobile Racing
Testosterone
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar is expected to put in a tougher drug policy soon, but the new language would probably not change how the sanctioning body handled Ron Hornaday’s admission that he used testosterone.
snippet: Nascar is expected to put in a tougher drug policy soon, but the new language would probably not change how the sanctioning body handled Ron Hornaday’s admission that he used testosterone.
